author: colin-small
body:
I would love to have functionality in Powershell similar to the Linux tail command. This would be very useful to monitor various files (logs, etc..) in somewhat real-time.

Something similar to the "watch" command in Linux would also be very useful.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tail_(Unix)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tail_(Unix))

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watch_(command)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watch_(command))
